title: How do I turn on or off the mobile network?
answer:
Use either of the following methods: 

 Go to Settings > Wireless & networks > More > Mobile networks, and select or deselect Data enabled. 

 [In the notification panel, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109580) to turn on the mobile network. When the mobile network is turned on, ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109581) changes to ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109582). To turn off the mobile network, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109583).]()
